content: rounds round 21 b and c for all rounds hereafter where you find instructions with both bold and blue writing if the round is crocheted in 1 color all writing is crocheted in the same single color if the round is crocheted in 2 colors bold writing is crocheted in the second color blue and regular writing is crocheted in the 1st color if the round is crocheted in 3 colors bold writing is crocheted with the color written in bold and blue writing is crocheted with the color written in blue the treble_crochet s in this round are crocheted in the single_crochet of round 17 indicated in the 1st photo below the edc s in this round are made in the fl of the double_crochet of round 18 indicated in the 2nd photo below chain 1 single_crochet fpedc treble_crochet 3fpedccl around the fpsc of round 18 treble_crochet fpedc single_crochet 2 edc single_crochet fpedc 3fpedccl around the fpedc of round 19 fpedc single_crochet 2 edc x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull 21 see 1st photo below chain 1 decrease single_crochet decrease 2 double_crochet the 1st double_crochet is made in the single_crochet of round 20 that is hidden behind the fpedc of round 21 indicated
